title: Zygor Guides 4.0.7413 (October 25th, 2013)
description:
Zygor Guides update v4.0.7413, released October 25th, 2013. (Horde and Alliance)



Install instructions: 

1) DO NOT USE THE OFFICIAL ZYGOR LAUNCHER FOR ANY REASON.

2) Extract the .zip and drop the ZygorGuidesViewer folder into your WoW/Interface/Addons folder and overwrite the current installation.


Mac-Only install instructions:

1) Put the ZygorGuidesViewer folder in Hard Drive/Applications/World of Warcraft/Interface/AddOns.

2) (Optional) Open World of Warcraft, login, click the Addons button on the Character Select Screen, make sure Zygor is selected, and check the "Load out of date addons" box. Some users have stated that this step is rarely/never necessary


Changelog:

-------

[B] Achievements

Added an alternate purchase option in the Drown Your Sorrows achievement for Murky Water and Fungus Squeezings



[B] Mounts

Added in the Magic Broom Mount to the guides

Added the Grand Armored Wyvern/Gryphon Mounts to the guides



[B] Professions

Added a note to warn players that they must be at least level 85 before proceeding in the Cooking guide



[B] Dungeons

Added in the map information for the Siege of Orgrimmar



[B] Cataclysm Achievements - To All The Squirrels and Pest Control:

Updated Viewer Models.

"Love" Macros should now work properly.



[A] Loremaster

Duskwood: Added extra tips to assist players.

Westfall: Added player tips and Furlbrow's Pumpkin Patch flight path.

Eastern Plaguelands: Added player tips and waypoints for improved navigation. Added Light's Shield Tower, Light's Hope Chapel, Eastwall Tower, Northpass Tower and Plaguewood Tower flight paths.

Hinterlands: Added player tips and Stormfeather Outpost flight path.

Burning Steppes: Added helpful tips and waypoints for navigation

Cape of Stranglethorn: Fixed incorrect npc ID, added tip for quest "High Priest Venoxis", which otherwise would cause the quest to bug

Duskwood: Fixed minor typo in guide, and added player tips
